name: Pasta Carbonara
steps: Beat eggs and egg yolk in a measuring cup or small bowl with Parmesan. Add black pepper and beat until well incorporated.
Fill a pot with water and salt generously. Bring to a boil and add pasta once boiling.
Dump pancetta into a cold pan, and turn the heat to medium.
Once cooked, but not crispy, strain a small amount of fat out and return to medium-low heat. Add garlic and saute for one minute.
Once pasta is cooked, toss with pancetta and evenly coat in pancetta fat.
Dump egg mixture into pasta and mix rigorously. Add leftover pasta water as needed. Salt to taste and top with Parmesan cheese.
